channel.title: 667/704 Minor Problem
channel.description: I'm having problem with mixing herbs into vials of water and making potions for the Herblore skill, I've gotten the Make X interface but doesn't work when I click on it. Any pointers on where I should go look for in the source? Should I go find the Herblore.java and see if the problem is there?
